channel.title: Node-Images on Sujith Quintelier
channel.description: Recent content in Node-Images on Sujith Quintelier

item.title: aks: Release 2026-01-04
item.description:
AKS release 2026-01-04: Ubuntu 24.04 becomes the default OS SKU starting Kubernetes v1.35; multiple OS/node image updates and security/component upgrades; deprecations and retirements announced (Ubuntu 18.04 removed, Azure Linux 2.0 end-of-support and removal, Basic Load Balancer retired, Kubernetes 1.31 deprecated); several new previews and behavioral changes; important dates and migration actions required.

  • Source: Release notes from AKS

item.title: aks: Release 2025-08-29
item.description:
AKS v20250829 announces AKS Automatic general availability and multiple platform, networking, security, and component updates including new AKS patch versions, region expansions for API Server VNet Integration, Kubernetes 1.30 EOL, and several behavioral/observability changes.

  • Source: Release notes from AKS
